title: Very User Friendly
text: The most efficient metro sys in the world. Extremely user friendly. Almost 50% concession is given to senior citizen. Its almost like a city in the Basement. People are very friendly

title: Best Option
text: Its a very modern and hi-tech train, which is very user friendly. Ticket counter at the Arrival Hall is easily seen. Just a very short walk to boarding. Adequate space for storage. It takes about 20 mins to Kowloon, from where complimentary shuttle bus service is provided to most hotels nearby. At Kowloon Station, one can check-in for our flight

title: Great Value for Money
text:
Firstly, every 15 mins there is a complimentary shuttle bus service to the Airport Express, Kowloon terminal. Rooms are fairly large by HK standard. Run with Boy Scouts efficiency. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Complimentary breakfast is good. View from the rooms are nice since it overlooks a park.
Where it really scores is, on its prime location. Many eating joints are nearby, as are Wellcome & 7/11. Two metro stations are barely 10 mins away. Temple Str night Market is nearby. I have stayed here 3 times
I

title: Great Family Resort
text: Ladies at the Reception were friendly, helpful yet professional. Rooms are very large and comfortable. Though we dont have a view of the Caldera, nevertheless one gets to view the Ocean on the other side. Breakfast was very good. Its 15-20 mins walk to Fira, where buses to Oia re available. The property is well maintained.

title: Out of the World
text: Must undertake a guided tour to derive max benefit. Without a Guide, this could be another ruins. If you read some greek ancient history, you will understand Acropolis better

title: Must See
text: An amazing Museum which has been very innovatively made. The artefacts on display have been well marked. It takes 2-3 hours. Must visit the museum with a Guide to derive max benefits

title: Average business hotel
text: Firstly, the staff at the Reception could be more friendly and efficient. We stayed 4 nights and the rooms were average. Metro stations are 15-20 mins walk. Getting taxi is also a challenge. Breakfast is very good. There aren't any restaurants nearby. The lobby is mostly crowded.

title: Awesome
text:
I stayed at ITC Windsor from 12 to 14 Nov 2019. Everything was better than most International hotels. Beginning with the Reception Desk, politeness and efficiency was their hallmark. The hotel premises were spic and span. The Towers room was very comfortable and extremely well furnished. The overall decor was tasteful. Restaurants, Dam Pukth and Raj Pavilion served delicious fares
Check out was a painless and quick. My compliments to the Manager and Staff for running a happy team
place: ITC Windsor, Bengaluru - a Luxury Collection Hotel

title: Awesome Location
text:
The hotel is run with Boy Scouts efficiency. Check in and check out are quick and smooth. I had to check out at 0700 hrs, and the staff was very cooperative. Rooms are very well appointed and the housekeeping staff did a great job in cleaning it everyday. The staff at the Restaurant was efficient and friendly.
Location of the hotel makes it ideal for tourists. Being very close to the MRT station, is an added advantage

title: Super Train
text: For a first-time visitor to Hong Kong, this is the ideal way to reach your hotel quickly. The process of buying ticket and boarding etc is very user friendly. Its high speed and comfort leaves most travellers spellbound. The facility to check-in at Kowloon and HK mtr stations is a great advantage. Travelling in Airport Express is an experience

title: Fun Place
text: Its very touristy and fun to spend a couple of hours. Enthusiasm of the shopkeepers makes shopping fun. Must bargain market. One of the best places to pick up nick-knacks. Most shoppers seemed to enjoy the experience.

title: Pune must Do
text: Kalyani Bakery is both a landmark and an institution of Pune. It is strategically located on the prestigious East Street in Camp Area. The very fact that many other bakeries have started marketing their "trademark "Shrewsbury" biscuit is proof of their uniqueness. Kalyani Bakery is so popular that on most days their products are sold out. Must visit place for tourists

title: Landmark of Pune
text:
A historical landmark of Pune. It is located on the Nagar Highway in Kalyani Nagar, on the banks of Mula River. Due to the majestic trees in the well kept garden, the Palace is hidden from view from the highway
Aga Khan has many followers in Bombay and Pune and hence his holiness constructed this impressive palace. It was converted into a political prison by the British for the leaders of India's freedom struggle The most famous of the prisoners housed here were Mahatma Gandhi and his wife. Kasturba Gandhi (Gandhi's wife) died in captivity here. The palace is now a museum and is open to all
Must see for visitors to Pune

title: Indian fast food restaurant
text:
Vaishali is a very very popular vegetarian restaurant serving "south Indian" fast food like dosas, idli, Uthappa, thalis etc. It is located in Deccan Gymkhana area opposite the famous Fergueson College. The restaurant serves authentic Udupi preparation of southern dishes that are very popular
The restaurant is always packed but the efficient and friendly staff would seat you in 10-15 mins. The food is very hygienic and presentation is good. Very reasonably priced

title: Cool
text:
CCD Fatimanagar is a popular meeting place. It is air conditioned and seating is very aesthetically done. It also has about six tables on the veranda for those who like the hustle and bustle of the busy Shivarkar Road
The staff is friendly but slow. The coffee shop serves bakery items too. Nice place to spend time with friends

title: Great hotel in Central Hong Kong
text:
I stayed seven days in mid July on a business trip. The rooms are excellent, large and well appointed. Just a few minutes by cab to CBD. I enjoyed the slow walk up from the Central MTR station while enjoying the view of the skyscrapers. The staff is businesslike and efficient. Breakfast could have a more international flavour
Yes would stay again

title: 'Must Do' for Tourists
text:
Had dinner with a friend on 22 July. It was a great experience to a tourist. We tried 7 dishes and they were delicious The portions were just right. A must do for all tourists
The only downside is the wait of nearly 40 mins to get a table
place: Tim Ho Wan, the Dim-Sum Specialists

title: Top Class
text: Very friendly and efficient and helpful staff at the Reception. They replaced the Kettle at 2330 hrs with a smile. The Room (811), was immaculate. The wifi very strong. Breakfast spread was awesome. and the location could not be better.

title: crowded
text: One has to wait for 15 mins before getting a table. people are waiting for you to vacate. The food is authentic South Indian Fast food. Service is quick

title: Authentic
text: The decor is good. The service is good but the waiters could be more polite and efficient. The food is delicious and authentic. Its possibly the Best Chinese restaurant in town. Slighty expensive
